xs:annotation.xs:documentation: We are adding a duplicate zipcode attribute because the database string has a typo in it and is not populating the zipCode attribute correctly. See Clear Quest ESR 3.12_CodeCR12297_GMT - Address Zip Code missing from payload. The plan is to remove this duplicate zipcode attribute after the database string is corrected.
